name: Robo Dash
description:
Robo Dash is an arcade high score based game where your goal is to rack up as many points as possible. Taking inspiration from a mini-game within the Mario Party series. Your goal is to not fall off an infinite number of platforms trying to go as far as you can. Challenge your friends to beat your high score or declare yourself champion and claim the number one best high score. The game includes a customization tab where you are allowed to make a unique version of your own character with 8 different color options and a variety of choices on hats.

Controls

Jump - RMB/Tap

Double Jump - Double Rmb/Tap
